trans-unit.source: Crops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: CroppedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: CroppedBitmap 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can occur only during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只有在物件初始設定期間發生屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>發出信號，初始設定開始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>來表示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: CroppedBitmap objects created by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and properties cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用 CroppedBitmap 物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29>建構函式會自動初始化，且無法變更屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29>

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果映像儲存到檔案後套用轉換，則必須更新映像資料相關的中繼資料標記。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A> property of this class to define the area of the bitmap that is to be cropped.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A>屬性的這個類別，以定義要裁剪之點陣圖的區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> class that has the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>類別具有指定<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect*>

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: BeginInit 之間必須進行屬性初始化和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>已初始化，屬性變更會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"> </xref>目前正在初始化。

trans-unit.source: BeginInit has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 已經呼叫 BeginInit。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"> </xref>已經初始化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖的來源。

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the Source property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> to the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以鏈結<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>至另一個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>至適當的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>的 Source 屬性</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: For more information about chaining, see [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需鏈結的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 鏈結 BitmapSource 物件一起](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖來源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖將裁剪成的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> with a SourceRect set to <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will render the entire image.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>與設 SourceRect<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>整個影像。</xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that is not fully within the bounds of the bitmap will not render.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖的範圍內是不完全的矩形將不會呈現。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖將裁剪成的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
